_header: So is imprinted in my remembrance
Subjects: lovers, addresses to beloved; lovers, faithful
_description: Devotion to his mistress — one 8-line stanza (with music) signed ‘Walterus ffry’

YaleBei91.First Lines:
So ys emprentid in my remembranceIour grodly port your frenly
                    continanceyour wommanhede Iour þowghtYour prysid byaulte with
                    Iour…
YaleBei91.Last Lines:
…ort heuenesse myn hert ys with yow go gowey þat ye
                    goContratenorTenor That þat lordi all wot
YaleBei91.Note:
Not Beinecke Library 9 as listed in Brown  and  Robbins (1943)
XCarleton Fairchild Brown,   and  Rossell Hope Robbins.  
             The Index of Middle English Verse.
         New York: Printed for the Index Society by Columbia University Press,
            1943.
